list.abs: 这个效应称为重力透镜 (gravitational lensing)，而上面这种形态的影像称为爱因斯坦十字架 (Einstein Cross)。 更有意思的是，爱因斯 …
gravitational attraction 引力，重力gravitational constant 引力常数，引力常量gravitational field 引力场，重力场
重力加速度(Gravitational acceleration)是一个物体受重力作用的情况下所具有的加速度。 假设一个质量为m的质点与一质量为M的均匀球体的距离为r时,质量所受的重力.
毛细管水(capillary water)指由于毛管力所保持在土壤颗粒毛细管内的水分。植物所吸收的水分主要是毛细管水。重力水(gravitational water)指水分饱和的土壤中,在重力作用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from modern Latin gravitat-, from the verb gravitare, from Latin gravitas 'weight'

entry.tran: 被吸引到；受吸引而参加
entry.def: If you gravitate towards a particular place, thing, or activity, you are attracted by it and go to it or get involved in it.

example.ex: Traditionally young Asians in Britain have gravitated towards medicine, law and engineering.
example.tran: 英国的亚裔年轻人通常被吸引到医学、法律及工程专业。

sentences.sentence: "Boys gravitate towards girls at that age"

means.word_mean: 3. move due to the pull of gravitation;

auth_sentence.content: Systems of bodies which gravitate round a central body.
auth_sentence.res_content: Systems of bodies which gravitate round a central body.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Systems of bodies which gravitate round a central body.

auth_sentence.content: Both Democrats and Republicans seem to gravitate towards him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both Democrats and Republicans seem to gravitate towards him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both Democrats and Republicans seem to gravitate towards him.

auth_sentence.content: People by nature will gravitate to what they can do.
auth_sentence.res_content: People by nature will gravitate to what they can do.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People by nature will gravitate to what they can do.

stems_affixes.word_buile: grav重+e→n.坟墓 adj.严肃的,庄重的
grav重+e→n.坟墓 adj.严肃的,庄重的
gravid[adj.怀孕的, 妊娠的]+a→n.孕妇
gravitate[v.受吸引,受重力作用下沉]+ion表名词→n.地心吸力,引力作用
grav重+ity表名词→n.重力,引力;严肃,庄重

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受吸引,受重力作用下沉

means.word_mean: 被吸引到；受吸引而转向

sentences.en: Most visitors to New York gravitate to Times Square.
sentences.cn: 大多数来纽约的游客都被吸引到时代广场。

sentences.en: We all gravitated towards the food.
